name: HomeWorkoutExerciseVideoFitness7DayVideos
0:
”Alexa start exercise videos.”
”Alexa, ask exercise videos about Mondays Workout.”
”Alexa, ask exercise videos about Tuesdays Workout.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: exercise videos
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Home Workout Videos with different exercises you can do at home, with different exercises for each day of the week which you can do with no special equipment. 

You can watch these exercise videos on your Echo Show, Echo Spot or Fire TV, the audio of the videos will also play on your Echo Speakers or through the Alexa App, so you can listen to the audio description of the exercises even without a screen.

FITNESS AND EXERCISE DISCLAIMER

As with all exercise programs, when using these exercise videos, you need to use common sense and exercise caution to reduce and avoid injury. 

You will want to check with your doctor before beginning any exercise or fitness program. 

By performing any of the exercise videos in these videos licensed by Simeon Tuitt Direct to bring them to you in this skill, you are performing them at your own risk. 

Simeon Tuitt, Simeon Tuitt Direct, Amazon and non of its subsidiaries will not be responsible or liable for any injury or harm you sustain as a result of following these exercise videos, or audio instruction of the exercises on smart speakers, phone or any other device. 

By following and using these exercise videos you acknowledge you are fully responsible for any and all injury that may occur after exercises are performed.

PERMISSIONS REQUESTED BY SKILL AND WHY SIMEON TUITT DIRECT NEEDS THEM

Simeon Tuitt Direct exercise videos skill requests your full name and e-mail address, these are needed before you can use the exercise video skill. 

The name and e-mail are used to inform you of updates to the exercise video skill and updates about new exercise skills Simeon Tuitt Direct releases, we may also request feedback from you on how we can improve the skill.

Simeon Tuitt Direct spend a lot of money on building skills and licensing rights to videos like the videos available through this skill, so requesting your name and e-mail to reach you about skill updates and related exercise skills is a small trade off for access to the exercise videos skill.
